attributes.title: Very glitchy and unreliable
attributes.review: This app was so disappointing! Something must be wrong with the coding, it glitches out immediately and stalls out my phone. Unreliable. Wrong.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: If you’re thinking about getting this app DON’T DO IT!!! As soon as you open it you see a hideous thing... the annoying, child rapist, homophobic, racist, sexist orange. If anyone out there is wanting to commit suicide don’t, outlive the orange.

attributes.title: A👏W👏F👏U👏L👏
attributes.review:
I, a respectful member of my gen z community, downloaded this app to worship our president. Until I found out that this app has f a i l e d the vibe check!!!! The hype from this app is simply unacceptable (much like our holy Cheeto). Only bad things shall come from this app. 

🛑❌TREAD WITH CAUTION❌🛑

attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: This app called me a disappointment and a stupid rat because I pressed the wrong button I also think that this app recorders you do not download 😟😖

attributes.title: Trash app
attributes.review: This app is dumb like who really gonna use use this. Donald Trump ain’t gonna be our president for much longer so mind as well delete the app while you still can.

attributes.title: Horrible app waste of time
attributes.review: The design is awful. Can’t navigate through the app for nothing. Can’t stand it. Would not recommend.

attributes.title: Crap
attributes.review: First of all, I do not like Trump but i was curious about this app, and as expected, it was absolutely DISGUSTING. The layout is just really boring and the things he’s trying to do is even worse.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I was absolutely mortified by the extremely poor quality of the app. Also very disappointed by the appearance and will not be voting for Trump after this TERRIBLE experience.

attributes.title: This app is COMPLETELY TERRIBLE!!
attributes.review: I was just trying to support the big guy in office but to my dismay, I found that this app is full of FAKE NEWS!!!! I was looking at the different things on it and realized what a complete bimbo he is.

attributes.title: worst app ever!
attributes.review: this app is disgusting and a waste of time. DO NOT GET IT ! if you get this app, your phone will have 20+ viruses and you will be cursed for the rest of your life. sorry but i don’t make the rules
